codeSystems.name: VS_IVI_MedicationForm
codeSystems.title: IVI Medication Form
codeSystems.description: ValueSet of the IVI Medication Form

codeSystems.name: VS_IVI_TreatmentRegimen
codeSystems.title: IVI Treatment Regimen
codeSystems.description: ValueSet of the IVI Treatment Regimen/Protocol

codeSystems.name: VS_Normal_Abnormal
codeSystems.title: Normal Abnormal
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing codes that indicate the normality status of a clinical finding or condition. It includes codes from system Snomed CT where concept descendant-of $SCT#276800000 (Normality findings (qualifier value)).

codeSystems.name: VS_Performed_NotPerformed
codeSystems.title: Performed NotPerformed
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing the status of a procedure or action, indicating whether it has been performed or not.

codeSystems.name: VS_Present_Absent
codeSystems.title: Present Absent
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing codes that indicate the presence, absence, or unknown status of a clinical finding or condition.

codeSystems.name: VS_SUN_Cells
codeSystems.title: SUN Cells
codeSystems.description: ValueSet of the allowed values for the Standardization of uveitis nomenclature (SUN) for Anterior Chamber Cells.

codeSystems.name: VS_SUN_Flare
codeSystems.title: SUN Flare
codeSystems.description: ValueSet of the allowed values for the Standardization of uveitis nomenclature (SUN) for Anterior Chamber Flare.

codeSystems.name: VS_Used_NotUsed
codeSystems.title: Used NotUsed
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing the status of a device, indicating whether it has been used or not.

codeSystems.name: VS_Eye_Laterality
codeSystems.title: Eye Laterality
codeSystems.description: Describes which eye of the patient was analyzed.

codeSystems.name: VS_Imaging_Methods
codeSystems.title: Imaging Methods
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing standardized imaging procedures used in ophthalmology.

codeSystems.name: VS_IOP_Code
codeSystems.title: IOP Code
codeSystems.description: Codes used to specify the laterality of the eye.

codeSystems.name: VS_IOP_Methods
codeSystems.title: IOP Methods
codeSystems.description: Describes the various methods of capturing IOP (Intraocular Pressure).

codeSystems.name: VS_IVOM_Medication
codeSystems.title: IVOM Medication
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing various optotypes used in visual acuity testing.

codeSystems.name: VS_VA_Lens_Types
codeSystems.title: VA Lens Types
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet includes codes representing different types of lenses used in ophthalmology. It covers contact lenses, eyeglasses and trial lenses.

codeSystems.name: VS_VA_Categorial_Values
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Categorial Values
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing categorical values for visual acuity assessments.

codeSystems.name: VS_VA_Code
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Code
codeSystems.description: SNOMED or LOINC code

codeSystems.name: VS_VA_Correction_Method
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Correction Methods
codeSystems.description: Methods of correction used during a visual acuity test.

codeSystems.name: VS_VA_Methods
codeSystems.title: VA Methods
codeSystems.description: Describes the various charts that can be used to assess visual acuity where concept descends from 400912000 (Visual acuity test equipment (physical object)).

codeSystems.name: VS_VA_Optotypes
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Optotypes
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing various optotypes used in visual acuity testing.

codeSystems.name: VS_VA_Quantity_Units
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Units
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing the units of measurement used in visual acuity assessments.

codeSystems.name: VS_VA_Special_Testing_Parameters
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Special Testing Parameters
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing special parameters used in visual acuity testing that go beyond standard acuity measures.

codeSystems.name: VS_VA_Test_Distance
codeSystems.title: Visual Acuity Test Distance
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing different test distances.

codeSystems.name: VS_MacularEdema_Method
codeSystems.title: Method of finding a macular edema
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing the methods for discovering a macular edema.

codeSystems.name: VS_Macular_OCT_Thickness_Map
codeSystems.title: Macular OCT Thickness Map
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing the various subfield thickness measurements of the macula obtained through OCT.

codeSystems.name: VS_RNFL_OCT_Thickness_Map
codeSystems.title: Retinal nerve fiber layer OCT Thickness Map
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing the various thickness measurements of the retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) obtained through OCT.
